abstract: Le Lab, an internal Web site at Altadis, Europe’s tobacco giant, is meant to be part social networking site, part data resource, part virtual pep rally.
snippet: Le Lab, an internal Web site at Altadis, Europe’s tobacco giant, is meant to be part social networking site, part data resource, part virtual pep rally.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Only the select few can enter the online preserve of Altadis, the European tobacco giant. Inside, visitors find a parallel universe where willowy models strut down the runway with cigarettes hanging from their pouty lips, and celebrities like Bob Dylan, Clint Eastwood and Brad Pitt flaunt smoking as the ultimate symbol of chic rebellion.

headline.main: Private Place for Smokers, on the Web
headline.print_headline: European Tobacco Giant Puts Up Private Web Site for Smokers
